dim.description: dim, [color=light_yellow]barely revealing the shapes around you[/color] and leaving most corners lost in [i]shadow[/i].

glowing.description: [b]glowing[/b] with a steady, [color=light_blue]unnatural light[/color] that seems to come from [i]nowhere[/i].

flickering.description: flickering erratically, as if struggling to stay [b]alive[/b].

starlit.description: starlit, with tiny specks above casting a cold, [color=cyan]celestial[/color] shimmer.

blinding.description: [b]blinding[/b], flooding the space with overwhelming brilliance and harsh contrast.

bioluminescent.description: bioluminescent, seeping from strange moss and fungi that pulse with [i]eerie rhythm[/i].

shadow_drenched.description: shadow drenched, with barely a glimmer to outline the [i]void[/i] around you.

pulsing.description: pulsing gently, as if the chamber itself were [b]breathing[/b] light in and out.

ethereal_glow.description: bathed in an [i]ethereal glow[/i] that feels both soothing and unnatural.

candle_lit.description: candle lit, casting warm, trembling shadows that [b]dance[/b] along the walls.
